title: Bunaglow Home with Patio Close By the Beach
posting_body: This charming Santa Monica bungalow with private patio is available for rent!
This charming one bedroom bunaglow home is part of a small quiet 7-unit property, located just 7 blocks from the beach, short walk to south
Main street boutique shopping and restaurants, the world famous 3rd Street Promenade and Santa Monica Pier.
Private patio, no shared walls with neighbors, a very charming quiet small community makes this home unique in the desirable Santa Monica area.
1 Bed / 1 Bath remodeled bungalow style home
Kitchen includes dishwasher, fridge and stove
Window A/C's, gas wall heater and
1st months rent + deposit due upon signing
Show proof of income (2 most recent paycheck stubs and 2 months of most recent bank statements)
We run a background check and eviction check.
Agent and leasor to do their own due diligence and investigation of all information provided herein or anywhere else and any information provided by agent, owner or their rep at any time.
